title: [K-12] Mathematical Talent Development Program to Foster Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Simple Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Problem-situation-based activities for mathematical creativity development in blended learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze six types of challenging math problem situations and derive at least three creative problem-solving strategies.
Learners can apply mathematical optimization techniques by approaching the same problem type from various angles.
Learners can integrate peers' ideas through collaborative learning to create new problem-solving methods.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
